mapper.sql: id, status, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, name, telphone, address
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO gk_agent ( status, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, name, telphone, address ) VALUES ( #{status}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{lastModDate}, #{name}, #{telphone}, #{address} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE gk_agent
status = #{status},
creator = #{creator},
createDate = #{createDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
name = #{name},
telphone = #{telphone},
address = #{address},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE gk_agent
status = #{map.status},
creator = #{map.creator},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
name = #{map.name},
telphone = #{map.telphone},
address = #{map.address},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gk_agent ( status, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, name, telphone, address ) VALUES ( #{map.status}, #{map.creator}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.name}, #{map.telphone}, #{map.address} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM gk_agent
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{status} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{creator} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{lastModifier} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{lastModDate} , '%')
AND name like CONCAT('%', #{name} , '%')
AND telphone like CONCAT('%', #{telphone} , '%')
AND address like CONCAT('%', #{address} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
